name: improper

improper adjective
(DISHONEST)
Add to word list

formal dishonest and against a law or a rule: improper use The governor has denied making improper use of state money.

improper adjective
(RUDE)
related to sex in a way that is rude or socially unacceptable: improper suggestions I trust you're not making improper suggestions to my husband!

dishonest, and not allowed by a rule or by law: The cropland may have been polluted because of improper use of pesticides and fertilizers. improper accounting/payments/trading improper activity/conduct/practices improperly adverb
